News.headline: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 12th December
News.page_title: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 12th December
News.URL_keywords: West Ham United U23 Fixture At The Daggers 12th December
News.short_description: Come and watch West Ham’s up and coming talent in their seventh home U23 fixture against Swansea City U23 to see if they can carry on their good form during the season so far.
News.description:
Just coming off the back two defeats to Brighton and Fulham, the Hammers will look to get back to winning ways to continue to improve and make a challenge for the title this year.  

The game will be played on Monday 12th December with a 7:00pm kick off.

West Ham United U23 Previous Five Results:
West Ham 1-3 Brighton and Hove Albion
Fulham 4-1 West Ham
West Ham 1-1 Blackburn Rovers
Northampton Town 1-1 West Ham (Checkatrade Trophy)
Nottingham Forest 1-2 West Ham

With first team players such as Sofiane Feghouli and Edimilson Fernandes playing in previous U23 fixtures for West Ham and the Hammers eager to get back to winning ways, it’s got the recipe to be a great night of Football here at the Chigwell Construction Stadium. 

The Night is free for West Ham Season Ticket holders, but everyone is welcome with tickets priced at £5 for adults and £3 concessions. The Clubhouse will be open to enjoy before and after the game.
